best_solutions.dcep_description: Lists the as optimal determined solutions in descending order

case_1.dcep_description: The optimal solution for the first input case

mass.dcep_description: Input: Total system mass wet including margins

m_dry_nomargin.dcep_description: total dry mass including all margins

m_margin.dcep_description: total mass of all margins. based on statistics.

m_propellant.dcep_description: propellant mass calculated by tsiolkosvky of inputs

m_payload.dcep_description: total payload mass. based on statistics.

m_structure.dcep_description: total structural mass. based on statistics.

m_thermal.dcep_description: total thermal system mass. based on statistics.

m_power.dcep_description: total power system mass. based on statistics.

m_ttc.dcep_description: total telemetry, tracking and control system mass. based on statistics.

m_adc.dcep_description: total attitude determination and control system mass. based on statistics.

m_propulsion.dcep_description: total propulsion system mass. based on statistics, refined by additional modelling.

m_misc.dcep_description: accounting for other minor masses, could be considered an additional margin.

m_other.dcep_description: accounting for other minor masses, could be considered an additional margin.

m_tank.dcep_description: tank mass required for system solution

m_thruster.dcep_description: thruster mass required for system solution

m_PPU.dcep_description: power processing mass required for electric propulsion system

mass_fractions.dcep_description: Ratios of all subsystem masses in relation to the total system mass

frac_m_dry_nomargin.dcep_description: total dry mass including all margins to total mass fraction

frac_m_margin.dcep_description: total mass of all margins to total mass fraction

frac_m_dry_margin.dcep_description: total dry mass without margin to total mass fraction

frac_m_propellant.dcep_description: propellant mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_payload.dcep_description: total payload mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_structure.dcep_description: total structural mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_thermal.dcep_description: total thermal system mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_power.dcep_description: total power system mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_ttc.dcep_description: total telemetry, tracking and control system mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_adc.dcep_description: total attitude determination and control system mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_propulsion.dcep_description: total propulsion system mass to total mass fraction

frac_m_other.dcep_description: misscellameous to total mass fraction, can be considered to be a margin

dv.dcep_description: Input: Total velocity increment of the mission

power_propulsion.dcep_description: Input: Total propulsion system electric power

power_jet.dcep_description: Total jet output power of the propulsion system

power_thruster.dcep_description: Total electric power consumption of the propulsion system

propellant.dcep_description: Describes the current propellant used by the propulsion system

c_e.dcep_description: Effective exhaust velocity of the propulsion system

eff_PPU.dcep_description: Power conversion efficiency of the Power Propulsion Unit (PPU)

eff_thruster.dcep_description: El. power to jet power conversion efficiency of the thruster

maneuver_duration.dcep_description: Total time to perform the full dv of all maneuvres.

evolution_success.dcep_description: Flags the sucess of the recent generation. Relevant for algorithm analysis and debugging.

n_success.dcep_description: Counter for convergence of lineage. Relevant for algorithm analysis and debugging.

subsystem_powers.dcep_description: Power requirement of all spacecraft subsystems

p_structure.dcep_description: power demand for operation structures and mechanisms

p_ttc.dcep_description: power demand for tracking telemetry and command

p_adc.dcep_description: power demand for attitude determination and control

frac_p_payload.dcep_description: power demand fraction of the payload

frac_p_structure.dcep_description: power demand fraction for operation structures and mechanisms

frac_p_thermal.dcep_description: power demand fraction for thermal control

frac_p_power.dcep_description: power demand fraction for power conditioning

frac_p_ttc.dcep_description: power demand fraction for tracking telemetry and command

frac_p_obc.dcep_description: power demand fraction for on-board computer

frac_p_adc.dcep_description: power demand fraction for attitude determination and control

frac_p_propulsion.dcep_description: power demand fraction for propulsion systems

convergence.dcep_description: Indicator of lineage has converged, should always be 1

system.dcep_description: Parametric modelled system parameters are listed here

power.dcep_description: Power system parameters are listed here

heat.dcep_description: Worst case generated heat of this component

PV.dcep_description: Photovoltaic system parameters are listed here

PV_power_output_required.dcep_description: Photovoltaic cells worst case output required power

PV_eff_area_required.dcep_description: Photovoltaic required total area for worst case power assumption

Q_PV_solar_irradiance.dcep_description: Worst case heat on photovoltaic cells created by solar irradiance

battery.dcep_description: Parameters of the required battery system are listed here

E_battery_required_max.dcep_description: Maximum to be stored electrical energy

converter.dcep_description: parameters of the power conversion system listed here

I_PDU_in.dcep_description: Maximum input current of PV to batt

I_PDU_out.dcep_description: Maximum output current of batt to sat

n_cycles_per_year.dcep_description: Number of battery cycles required for a full year stay in nominal orbit

p_a_mean.dcep_description: Mean solar irradiance constant of nominal orbit

p_a_min.dcep_description: Minimum solar irradiance constant of nominal orbit

p_a_max.dcep_description: Maximum solar irradiance constant of nominal orbit

p_consumed_max.dcep_description: Maximum output power to be consumed from batteries in worst case

power_margin.dcep_description: Reference standard power margin applied for system design.

height.dcep_description: Reference orbit height above Earrth center for circular nominal orbit

velocity.dcep_description: Mean velocity for circular nominal orbit

orbit.dcep_description: Time to complete full orbit revolution

shadow.dcep_description: Orbit shadow times are listed here

umbra.dcep_description: Time spacecraft in core shadow umbra for nominal orbit

penumbra.dcep_description: Time spacecraft in partial shadow penumbra for nominal orbit

average_light.dcep_description: Averaged time spacecraft in illumination for nominal orbit

full_light.dcep_description: Time spacecraft in full light for nominal orbit

comm_max.dcep_description: Time spacecraft in possible communication with groundstation with direct overpass, passing from horizon to horizon

magneticfield.dcep_description: Earth equatorial magnetic field strength at nominal orbit height
